questions.text: 'In a little cafe just the other side of the border'
What song is this opening line from:' When she was just a kid her clothes were hand-me-down'?
options: Can't You See That She's Mine
Do You Want to Know a Secret

questions.text: 'I don't know what it is that makes me love you so.'
questions.correct: I Only Want to Be With You
questions.explanation: I Only Want to Be With You.

questions.text: 'I met him at the candy store, he turned around and smiled at me'
'Who's that yonder dressed in white, Let my people go.'
'Clap your hands now everybody we're gonna have some fun tonight'
'Hey girls, gather round, listen to what I'm putting down'
options: 'The Way You Do the Things You Do'

questions.text: 'Woke up this mornin' feelin' fine, there's somethin' special on my mind'
'My love don't give me presents, I know that she's no peasant'
'You've been good to me, you made me glad when I was blue'
'White on white, lace on satin, blue velvet ribbons on her bouquet'
'Ev'rytime you kiss me I'm still not certain that you love me'
'Oh yeah I tell you somethin' I think you'll understand'
'First the tide rushes in, Plants a kiss on the shore'
'In Hawaii there's a place known as Waimea Bay'
'The best things in life are free, but you can keep them for the birds and bees.'
questions.explanation:
The Kingsmen.

	The Beatles also recorded this one around this time. The original artist for this song was Barrett Strong.
